p: Our aims were to (1) describe the procedures used for diagnosing clinical myxomatosis and RHD on commercial farms between 1988 and 2018, (2) estimate myxomatosis prevalence through farm visits over the 30-year period, (3) calculate the incidence of RHD, and (4), describe MYXV and RHDV vaccination schedules on 200 rabbit doe farms visited from the end of 2014 to 2018.
